comments.author: nmatsakis@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: The TestFailedCtor test case is currently disabled in the cross-thread case because, after its ctor fails, the child process invokes exit() to cleanup.  In the cross-thread case this brings down both the parent and the child.
comments.text: The TestFailedCtor test case is currently disabled in the cross-thread case because, after its ctor fails, the child process invokes exit() to cleanup.  In the cross-thread case this brings down both the parent and the child.
